item.title: Choosing the Number of Shards in Temporal History Service
item.description: Today, I’m diving into the topic of tuning your Temporal clusters for optimal performance. More specifically, I will be discussing the single configuration option: the number of History service shards. Through a series of experiments, I’ll explain how a low number of shards can lead to contention, while a large number can cause excessive resource consumption.
